## Assessment & Grading

::: incremental
-   **Discussion & Participation** intensive course *(15%)*
:::

::: incremental
-   Online reading and discussion with **Perusall** *(15%)*
:::

::: incremental
-   5 Assignments *(7% each: 35% total)*
    -   3 group presentations (with self & peer evaluation)
    -   2 response papers
:::

::: incremental
-   3 Exams *(15% each: 45% total)*
    -   short essay 7-10 questions in each exam
:::

Course total: *110%*

## Topics for this course {.smaller}

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
**Medical Topics**

::: incremental
-   Functional States:
    -   Circadian rhythms
    -   Sleep & Dreaming
-   Disruption of Functional States
    -   Disorders of Consciousness:
    -   Anesthesia
:::

::: incremental
-   Altered States
    -   Drug-induced States
    -   States of Dysfunction: Scizophrenia and Dissociative Disorders
:::
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
**Psychological Topics & Beyond**

::: incremental
-   Perception
    -   Pain perception
    -   Time awareness
    -   Spatial awareness
:::

::: incremental
-   Cognition
    -   Working Memory
    -   Long term Memory
    -   Self-awareness and identity
:::

::: incremental
-   Animal and Artifical Intelligence (AI)
